text_section1_index.title: Eco-consciousness in lingerie
text_section1_index.text: Carnelia represents a new way of crafting lingerie, offering a more inclusive and comfortable design. The core of lingerie is making people feel beautiful, confident, and at ease in their body. This goes beyond their size, gender, or how they define their femininity.

picture_section_text_index.title: Explore the Carnelia identity
picture_section_text_index.text:
We aim to redefine the outdated idea that comfort, aesthetic and sustainability are mutually exclusive.

This means fighting unrealistic beauty standards, unhealthy body images, and predetermined notions of femininity by returning to the true subject: the female body.

text_section2_index.title: Stories from the Carnelian archives
text_section2_index.text: Today, to achieve lingerie's main purpose, a change is needed. At Carnelia, we call this change Modern Lingerie. From social gatherings to brand operations, follow our journey towards our goal.

metadata_index.title: Carnelia - Modern and eco-conscious lingerie
metadata_index.meta_description: Welcome to Carnelia Lingerie. We make eco-conscious and feminine clothing.

opengraph_index.og_description: Welcome to Carnelia Lingerie. We make eco-conscious and feminine clothing.

text_section_brand_community.title: At Carnelia people are our core value
text_section_brand_community.text: We are a community, A space where people regain ownership over their own bodies. A reality where customers donâ€™t have to settle for a product that doesnâ€™t fully meet their needs, values, or self-definition. Carnelia is about choice. Oneâ€™s only concern should be their personal preferences, knowing that the brand theyâ€™re investing in cares for their comfort, physical needs, and the planet we live on.

picture_section_text1_brand_community.title: Total
picture_section_text1_brand_community.text: Positive reviews from our satisfied customers and from our community.

picture_section_text2_brand_community.title: Total satisfaction
picture_section_text2_brand_community.text: Positive reviews from our satisfied customers and from our community.

text_section_brand_purpose.title: Our mission and guiding light
text_section_brand_purpose.text: We have re-centered the focus of what a modern lingerie brand should be, with an eye directed toward the future. Carnelia represents a new way of crafting lingerie, offering a more inclusive and comfortable design. This design accommodates every body shape and size â€” and those in between â€” ensuring both physical support and psychological uplift.

picture_section_text1_brand_purpose.title: The values that define us
picture_section_text1_brand_purpose.text: We embody eco-conscious care as a holistic approach. Our focus is on recycled materials, fewer productions, quality over quantity, longer product lifespans, ethical manufacturing, and a sustainable aesthetic. Moreover, we are not a defining force; our job is to provide you with the product you need, whoever "you" are.

picture_section_text2_brand_purpose.title: A clear vision for the future
picture_section_text2_brand_purpose.text: Carnelia stands firmly and communicates openly about where we stand, especially on matters that closely touch our customers. We envision a world where anyone who needs a bra has access to a product that truly meets their needs, is comfortable to wear, sustainable, and allows them the freedom to define their own femininity.

text_section_responsibility_comfort.title: Striving towards comfort for everyone
text_section_responsibility_comfort.text: As a modern lingerie brand, we aim to adhere to the highest standards and we take on the responsibility of making lingerie for everyone. Our purpose is to fight unrealistic beauty standards, unhealthy body images and standardized ideas of what defines femininity. At Carnelia we have designed new technologies to ensure the support needed for the different sizes we offer. The three size ranges come with different backs.

picture_section_text1_responsibility_com.title: Classic
picture_section_text1_responsibility_com.text:
This version comes with the signature size range and offers extra support to those with a medium sized chest and moderate need of support. The back straps work as a rope and pulley, providing four contact points instead of two thus ensuring an even weight distribution.

This eases the strain on the shoulder straps and allows a more comfortable wear. The straps are connected via the ring at the shoulder blade area. This ring connects the shoulder strap and the two straps that connect to the back of the underbust band.

picture_section_text2_responsibility_com.title: Signature!
picture_section_text2_responsibility_com.text:
This version comes with the signature size range and offers extra support to those with a medium sized chest and moderate need of support. The back straps work as a rope and pulley, providing four contact points instead of two thus ensuring an even weight distribution.

This eases the strain on the shoulder straps and allows a more comfortable wear. The straps are connected via the ring at the shoulder blade area. This ring connects the shoulder strap and the two straps that connect to the back of the underbust band.

picture_section_text3_responsibility_com.title: Signature!
picture_section_text3_responsibility_com.text:
This version comes with the supreme size range. This option is for those with a large chest in need of maximum support. The straps are much wider than the classic and signature, allowing the weight from the front to be more comfortably dispersed on the shoulders.

The underbust band is thicker, ensuring even pressure dispersal on the ribcage, allowing the bra to feel more comfortable for someone with a need for utmost support.

text_section_responsibility_eco_consciou.title: Taking eco-responsibility is vital
text_section_responsibility_eco_consciou.text: Along with our responsibility to our community in terms of size, support and comfort, we also have a responsibility towards the planet. Itâ€™s our top priority to produce lingerie in an eco-conscious and ethical way.

picture_section_text1_responsibility_eco.title: Production is sourced close to home
picture_section_text1_responsibility_eco.text: We do so by using certified, recycled fabrics, designing aesthetically sustainable, and sourcing our materials in the near vicinity of our manufacturer. All of our production and sourcing is in Italy, thus reducing our Co2 emissions of transport and also ensuring high-quality and ethical production.

picture_section_text2_responsibility_eco.title: In search of the very best fabric
picture_section_text2_responsibility_eco.text:
All of our recycled fabrics are Global Recycled Standard certified and OEKO-Tex certified and we aspire to provide our community with the best quality products to adorn their bodies with.

At Carnelia we are not just crafting lingerie. We are creating a positive, lasting impact that supports and cares for both people and the planet.

text_section_responsibility_self_defined.title: Your femininity is your choice
text_section_responsibility_self_defined.text: At the core of Carnelia is the idea that femininity can be self-defined. We at Carnelia believe, that every woman has the right to express her own version of femininity with her clothing and our goal is to provide all women with pieces that fit any aesthetic. The Seasons collection is a mix of very different aesthetics, mirroring the feeling the seasons give us and how we want to feel during the season. All of the pieces have been carefully crafted with comfort and fit in mind.

picture_section_text1_responsibility_sel.title: The values that define us
picture_section_text1_responsibility_sel.text: We embody eco-conscious care as a holistic approach. Our focus is on recycled materials, fewer productions, quality over quantity, longer product lifespans, ethical manufacturing, and a sustainable aesthetic. Moreover, we are not a defining force; our job is to provide you with the product you need, whoever "you" are.

picture_section_text2_responsibility_sel.text: Carnelia stands firmly and communicates openly about where we stand, especially on matters that closely touch our customers. We envision a world where anyone who needs a bra has access to a product that truly meets their needs, is comfortable to wear, sustainable, and allows them the freedom to define their own femininity.
